CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Figure 9 shows the incident photon - to - current conversion efficiency ( IPCE ) spectra of the ITO / PEDOT : PSS / PFDTBT-10Per + PC71BM / LiF and TiO x / Al devices.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. ITO
2. PEDOT : PSS
3. PFDTBT-10Per
4. PC71BM
5. LiF
6. TiO x
7. Al

These are the names of materials used in the devices being compared in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the updated "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. PEDOT : PSS
2. PFDTBT-10Per
3. PC71BM
4. TiO x
5. Al

These are the materials that are clearly referred to by name in the paragraph. ITO and LiF are not explicitly mentioned as material names, but rather as components of a device.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| PFDTBT-10Per |
| PC71BM |
| TiO x |
| Al |

Note that the colon in "PEDOT : PSS" is part of the material name, indicating a ratio of PEDOT to PSS.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Figure 9 shows the incident photon - to - current conversion efficiency ( IPCE ) spectra of the ITO / PEDOT : PSS / PFDTBT-10Per + PC71BM / LiF and TiO x / Al devices.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. IPCE (incident photon-to-current conversion efficiency)
2. ITO (indium tin oxide)
3. PEDOT (poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene))
4. PSS (polystyrene sulfonate)
5. PFDTBT-10Per (10-phenyl-3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene)
6. PC71BM ([6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester)
7. LiF (lithium fluoride)
8. TiOx (titanium oxide)
9. Al (aluminum)

These are the entities that refer to specific properties or materials mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. ITO (indium tin oxide)
2. PEDOT (poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene))
3. PSS (polystyrene sulfonate)
4. PFDTBT-10Per (10-phenyl-3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene)
5. PC71BM ([6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester)
6. TiOx (titanium oxide)
7. Al (aluminum)

These are the materials mentioned in the paragraph that have relevant properties for the application described.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| ITO (indium tin oxide) |
| PEDOT (poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene)) |
| PSS (polystyrene sulfonate) |
| PFDTBT-10Per (10-phenyl-3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) |
| PC71BM ([6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester) |
| TiOx (titanium oxide) |
| Al (aluminum) |

Note that I've preserved the capitalization and formatting of the entity names as they appeared in the original paragraph.

PV.content:

2. PEDOT:PSS

4. PC71BM
5. LiF
6. TiOx

2. PEDOT:PSS
3. PFDTBT-10Per

5. LiF
